full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,THUN DRUG RNAL 'BYOR GYI ZIN BRIS RIG 'DZIN SNYING GI DO SHAL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @020A *, ,(CES DPAL MNYAM MED RI BO DGE LDAN PA'I ZAB CHOS MTHAR THUG THUN DRUG RNAL 'BYOR CES GRAGS PA'I KHRID KYI ZIN BRIS RIG 'DZIN SNYING GI DO SHAL ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, ^BKA' DRIN ZLA MED 'JAM DBYANGS BLA MA DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO'I BKA' DRIN LAS LNGA PHYIR THOS PA DAG BRJED PAS 'JIGS TE, DGE SLONG SHES RAB RGYA MTSOS YI GER BKOD PA'O, ,AOm SVA STI, CHOS SRID 'BYOR BA'I MDZOD DANG DGE BCU LDAN, ,DGA' LDAN RAB RGYAS ZHES BYA'I RGYUD GRVA CHER, ,KUN MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA YAB SRAS KYI, ,THUGS RJES CHOS SBYIN 'JIG MED RGYUN 'DI SPEL, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
